meanings.def: objects that can be moved, such as tables, chairs and beds, that are put into a house or an office to make it suitable for living or working in
examples: We need to buy some new furniture.
All the original furniture and fittings will be reinstated.
The room would look bigger if we rearranged the furniture.
The wood is used for making fine furniture.
an 18th-century town house, complete with period furniture

meanings.def: a person or thing that you are so used to seeing that you no longer notice them
examples: I worked there so long that I became part of the furniture.

idioms.def: a person or thing that you are so used to seeing that you no longer notice them
examples: I worked there so long that I became part of the furniture.
